title: Episode 187: The Seed of Change with Favianna Rodriguez
itunes:title: Episode 187: The Seed of Change with Favianna Rodriguez
itunes:subtitle: Kate can see clearly now that Doree has lifted the fog of egomaniac Peter Pans and Doree ventures into the world of personal styling. Then, they’re joined by Favianna Rodriguez, cultural activist and artist, as she discusses womb trauma, how growing he...
description:
Kate can see clearly now that Doree has lifted the fog of egomaniac Peter Pans and Doree ventures into the world of personal styling. Then, they’re joined by Favianna Rodriguez, cultural activist and artist, as she discusses womb trauma, how growing her own bouquet is self-care, and what cultural justice means to her.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
